extendedInfo.description: SENSITIVITY-RELATED PERSONALITY SPECTRUM TM Screening tool and autism education:Sovereign Research, LLC is proud to announce the release of its first mobile application that accurately and professionally assesses sensitivity as a personality trend. The application also provides a myriad of autism educational tutorials and videos.***** Universal App tablet/phone/iOS/Android/Nokia *****SCREENING TOOL:This is NOT a casual survey, or a lightly prepared one. This is a SCIENTIFICALLY VALIDATED questionnaire. The questions were carefully chosen from a pool of 150 possible questions and validated over 2 years in cooperation with 5 US based doctors. The clinicians helped hone in the most representative questions through interaction with a cohort consisting of several hundred patients.The questionnaire consists of 10 items only and can be completed in 2-3 minutes. There is an adult version and a child version.RESULTS- WHAT TO EXPECT:Completing the questionnaire leads to a results page which pinpoints where takers stand on the personality spectrum TM. The possible results include:Autistic personalityAspergerâs personalityHighly sensitive personalityEmotionally balanced personalityInsensitive personalityADH (attention deficit hyperactivity) personalityAUTISM EDUCATION:The app gives you instant access to timely and unique autism educational articles. All material is original and compiled from the author's 15 years of experience in autism. A growing number of educational videos are also included within the app.PRIVACY:Please note that this questionnaire & results and the whole application are meant solely for educational purposes and do not replace a relationship with a healthcare provider. More importantly this application does not aim to diagnose, treat or mitigate any disease or disorder.CREDITS:Developed by Sovereign Research, LLCGraphics by Graphics Ward.

reviews.title: Very off
reviews.comment: I took this test expecting the correct answers to show up, as I already know what I have. It told me I was \"balanced,\" when I am actually an aspie, I have ADHD, and that hsp thing. I advise you not to download this app, you will not get the correct results.
reviews.author: Meg Dwyer

reviews.title: Very inaccurate
reviews.comment: This test is extremely vague (some the possible answers have no connection to the question whatsoever), and even though I have been officially diagnosed with Asperger\'s and ADHD my test result was \"balanced\". Other then that, the application is very cluttered and definitely not user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t knock vagueness!
reviews.comment: This rated me at HSP, which is how I tested on Aron & Aron\'s test.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: UI requires reworking. Took the test and rotated my phone to landscape to read the results and the survey went back to the option page
reviews.author: A Google User
